name: coughdrop_desktop
description: CoughDrop AAC app, as a desktop app

scripts.installer: cd ../coughdrop_desktop_installer && grunt create-windows-installer && move ../coughdrop_desktop_installer/build/installer/64/Setup.exe  ../coughdrop_desktop_installer/build/installer/64/coughdrop-setup.exe && move ../coughdrop_desktop_installer/build/installer/64/Setup.msi  ../coughdrop_desktop_installer/build/installer/64/coughdrop-setup.msi && move ../coughdrop_desktop_installer/build/installer/32/Setup.exe  ../coughdrop_desktop_installer/build/installer/32/coughdrop-setup.exe && move ../coughdrop_desktop_installer/build/installer/32/Setup.msi  ../coughdrop_desktop_installer/build/installer/32/coughdrop-setup.msi

author: CoughDrop, Inc.
